data.description:
Feel the thrill of shotgun shooting, hone your skills in virtual reality and challenge your friends in multiplayer competitions! Clay Hunt VR is a realistic shotgun sports game with clay shooting and hunting modes. Hunting season is always open!

Game works with just the controllers or you can attach them to a gun stock accessory for more realistic feel.

Shoot clays in various disciplines or go hunting, unlock new guns and mods like magazine for the semi-auto. Start easy with the Beginner mode and work your way up to beating the most challenging courses!

CLAY SHOOTING: American & International trap, double trap, skeet and sporting clays with multiple courses. You can even design your own five-stand courses in the new Creative mode. Clay pigeon flight paths and leads are accurately simulated.

HUNTING: Ducks, pigeons and pheasant drives in varying bird hunting challenges! Get more with add-ons: upland hunting with your dog and the thrilling boar hunting (they do try to knock you out)!

MULTIPLAYER: Join the Discord channel and participate on competitions or go shooting with friends on a private room.

GUN STOCKS: Play with just the controllers or attach them to a gun stock for a more realistic feel. You can calibrate most of the gun stocks but for serious practice, we recommend the Real Stock Pro from Texture VR. You can adjust the dimensions and the weight to match your real shotgun. Find more information about the gun stocks available in the Clay Hunt VR Facebook group.

changelog.change_log:
- XP Requirement removed for the Rifle in Boar Hunting\n
- Gain more XP especially in beginner and intermediate modes. You get still most XP in professional mode!\n
- ForceTube haptic is now sent to all components

- Bug fixes\n
- Added ForceTubeVR pistol module force feedback for users with the whole setup\n
- Report pair delay is now 0.4 seconds

- ForceTube feedback adjusted and rumble added \n
- Additional multiplayer black screen issue fixed

Bug Fix: Pigeons did not spawn all around\n
Bug Fix: Blinking tree fixed in sporting clays course D\n
Ambient sounds adjusted\n
Lakeside optimized for quest 2
Bug Fix: Boar hunt freezed after round 16

- Fixed Boar Hunting game halt bug\n
- Smoothed the aim trace recoil filtering
Bug fix: Selecting tower in creative mode broke the user interface

- Option to show distance information in the options: Show distance of hits & throwers\n
- Choose if you prefer imperial or metric system in the options\n
- Fast bolt action in boar hunting with the default Controller mode: just push the thumb stick up\n
- Full Analysis: Recoil filtered from the aim trace\n
- Bug fix: American trap high scores weren’t saved\n
- Bug fix: It was possible to reload the bolt action rifle too fast\n
- Bug fix: Ammo was not decreasing in the rifle hunt\n

- Rifle shooting added to the Boar Hunting add-on (5000 XP required). Free for existing owners but Boar Hunting add-on is now $7.99\n
- Red Dot Sight available for the rifle and “BeniS2” semi-auto shotgun (15 000 XP required)\n
- Boar Hunting graphics improved\n
- Sporting Clays Challenges one additional miss allowed for one star\n
- Sporting Clays Challenges: After trying three times, it’s possible to lower the difficulty for that challenge\n
- Bug fixes

-New Semi-Auto gun with camouflage mod!\n
-English Skeet\n
-Better looking grass\n
-Bug fixes

New Add-on: Lakeside Course\n
\n
Go shooting sporting clays in a new beautiful lake location: 15 new challenges and three new courses.

- UPDATED BALLISTICS: hit testing in first few yards improved and time to target now more accurate on longer distances\n
- Renewed hits / misses display for practice modes\n
- Improved clay visibility in distance\n
- Adjusted American trap target flight

- Clay Hunt VR is now localized for: French, German, Italian, Spanish, Japanese and Arabic.\n
- Party Challenge: Beginner mode added.\n
- Party Challenge: Easier interaction with auto reload and auto gun grab.\n
- Tree shadows for Sporting Clays terrain.\n
- Bug fix: Target could disappear in creative with rabbit throwers.\n
- Bug fix: Boar Hunt progress freezed.

- Adjusted the arc of target flight in American Trap\n
- Bug Fix: Party Challenge did not play through if American Trap was selected in practise panel.\n
- Sporting Clays Challenge 10 adjusted
